name: discord-bot
description: Discord 음성 채널 활동 추적 봇

scripts.quality: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.pm2:start: npm run build && pm2 start dist/index.js --name discord-bot
scripts.pm2:prod: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs:discord-bot --env production
scripts.pm2: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem-termux.config.cjs --env production
scripts.setup: pkg install python nodejs sqlite libsqlite clang make && npm install
scripts.external: ERRSOLE_HOST=0.0.0.0 npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem-termux.config.cjs --env production && pm2 logs discord-bot
scripts.ip: termux-wifi-connectioninfo | grep 'ip_address' || ip route get 1.1.1.1 | grep -oP 'src \K\S+' || echo '핸드폰에서 설정 > Wi-Fi에서 IP 확인'
scripts.test: npm run quality && npm run build && node -e "import('./dist/config/logger-termux.js').then(m => m.logger.info('TypeScript 빌드 테스트 성공'));"
scripts.update: git pull && npm run build && pm2 delete discord-bot 2>/dev/null || true && pm2 start ecosystem-termux.config.cjs --env production && pm2 logs discord-bot
